title: PAVÉ HUGGIE EARRING, 14K WHITE GOLD
description: The classic pavé hoop earring in 4 sizes, from snug 6MM to roomy 12MM. Dress your ear the Dorsey way by wearing the same style graduated up the ear.
details:
Metal: 14k white gold
Stone Type: Lab-grown diamond
Stone Shape: Round cut
14K Gold Closure: 14K solid gold post 
Sizes: 6MM - 12MM

Diamond Carat (Single):


6MM: 0.075 CTW lab-grown diamond

8MM: 0.09 CTW lab-grown diamond
10MM: 0.13 CTW lab-grown diamond

12MM: 0.23 CTW lab-grown diamond



Fit note: Model’s first piercing measures 6.10MM from piercing to bottom of earlobe.
